name: 物理與生活
goals: 理解能源應用與生活的關聯
了解生活相關的輻射物質應用與物理概念
具有生活中不可或缺的電學、磁學相關概念與知識
了解全球氣候變遷與對生活及對生態的衝擊與生活中的行動策略
syllabus:
The course outline is as follows:

The following independent topics will be discussed:

1.       What are physics (science) and life and the relationship between them (introduction of the course)

2.       Sciences and superstition

3.       Destiny

4.       Nuclear energy and our fate

5.       Energy and Industrial revolution

6.       3rd industry revolution

7.       Job

8.       Environment

Students are required to submit a report of about 600 words after each topic

Students who want to achieve good grades (A-, A, A+) need to give a 30-minute oral presentation by the end of the semester, and places are limited to 8-10 students.

Note:

Internet addiction is classified as a mental disorder by the World Health Organization. If you don't go online or use your phone for more than ten minutes, the symptoms are anxiety and inability to concentrate. Should you have this problem, please do not take this course.

methodologies.note: Ask question and ask students to think
Designated topic report discussion, experience sharing report as the scoring benchmark

prerequisite: ◎Exclusive of students within Department of Physic
